caption: Close to being the worst meal I’ve ever had. Meat was chewy and all dishes where cold - lukewarm at best. Very friendly staff but not a good food experience.

This place is one of my friend's and I's favorite stops! It's recently under new management/ownership. The staff is lovely and kind (and patient with my lack of French). The food is fantastic. Everything we've had there is magnificent (I'd pass on the table popcorn though)
Great place for a casual bite. The food was delicious. Simple and fresh ingredients. Friendly staff.
I would describe this more like a Gastro-Pub you would find in the UK.  One main difference is the staff and service was of an extremely high quality and food was great.
Cosy… a bit home like…food is fine… drinks also. Ceasar salad and sausage
I recommend this place. People are friendly and the food is great. Went for a business lunch and had an amazing time.

This is a great little restaurant/bar! It was close to our hotel and we stopped for breakfast on our last day in Paris. Very friendly English speaking waiter, fresh squeezed orange juice great omelet with chocolate crepes... delicious!! Highly recommend..wish we would have found this treasure sooner,!

We came to this restaurant since it was next to our hotel but had an unpleasant experience. When we arrived they didn’t come to seat us but just pointed to an area. Once we sat down, we waited for menus but waitress would not come. We had to find them at other tables. Thankfully there was a couple of them already there. She finally came to take our order 15 minutes later. That was our first interaction with her. Granted our French is very bad but we tried to communicate the best with the waitress but she was very rude to us even though we were trying to be nice. Our whole family felt we were treated very unkind throuout our visit there. Maybe she was having a bad day, not sure. The pizza restaurant right next door was much different experience. Very good pizza and good kind service.
Had a hamburger and fries at this quaint little restaurant. Was amazing. Better than many I'vr enjoyed back home in Canada. Staff were very friendly. Highly recommend.
Spent a lot of time here whilst working at the Marriott next door. Good service from the regular waiters. Food is always nice and the drinks are nice. Averagely priced.
Great service and great food! Staff was very courteous and attentive. Food was fantastic! Highly recommend the Complete Omelette. Excellent place!
The waiter was very helpful and polite.  Food was good.  It is a little expensive but what do you expect if you don't go off the beaten path.
Friendly staff, decent prices. Went there twice during my stay in Paris. Order a B52 if you're looking for a great drink.

Worst french onion soup i have ever had.  Burnt bread in watery soup with some onions.  Sprinkle of cheese ... for 7 euros.  Sub-par chicken club sandwich ... not even half as good as a subway ... for 11 euros.  This is a tourist trap for Americans staying at the Marriott next door.
The food was quite good, but you have to be very specific with the waiter if you want happy hour prices.
T E R R I B L E!!!! Service, food, hair in the salad , black angus steak is a joke. Dont even try it. The most unpleasant experience in Paris.
The escargot is excellent. Friendly atmosphere! It is now our spot for the week we are here!
The food is amazing and the portions are generous. It became my little go-to place during my extended visit in Paris
Service was not nice food was cold (eg burger) Foie gras was not nice at all Fries are very good Way too expansive for quality
Great staff! Great food. Even helped me with my French!
Was overall very good, but 4.20 for coke is steep. Food was prompt and good quality.
Nice, clean good menu & and daily specials. Nice choice of coktails
Food is good,  but it can get very busy at lunchtime.
Amazing food, great service.  I'm def going back!!
Staff extremely friendly! Great place to grab a cocktail
Staff and service is great.  Don't go for the food.
Restaurant for the tourists! No value and poor service Food very average Walk away
Nice spot for a beer, good service and not too crowded
Bon resto mais service zero
Good sized portions for hungry tourists
Friendly & great food.
Miserable
Waw j'iff
Not bad
Long waiting, not very pretty
Ras
Poor Service

Very disappointing. Unpleasant, even mocking waiter. You ask if there are toilets and he answers “yes, behind the tree” while showing you the street. The formula is not explained. You say that you are taking a set menu and instead of presenting you with the different starters or dishes the waiter tells you "I'm not going to choose for you". You have to ask for the dishes that are waiting and are therefore served cold. The meat is fatty and not tender, the knife is not suitable. There is an error in the total (dessert is counted outside the formula although it is normally included) and when we point it out we just tell you that it's €2 less without any further explanation. This honestly doesn't make you want to come back. You feel more like a nuisance than a customer. For a formula paid 25€ the lack of pleasure at the table is expensive.
